Text.Page:
I don't understand what's happened with the vampirs. They were almost friendly with us for so long. We coexisted peacefully, anyway.

I hate saying this, but at this point, it's them, or us.

If you could get rid of the {@LinkCreature:16#2302#blood lords}, I'd feel better about this posting.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. So many people think this isn't their problem, but if we don't stop it now...well, I'm sure you follow.
